author: craigmcc
msg: Actually add the new ServerSocketFactory.java interface.

author: craigmcc
msg: Refactor org.apache.catalina.net.ServerSocketFactory to become
org.apache.catalina.ServerSocketFactory instead.  The old interface is
deprecated and extends the new one.

author: craigmcc
msg: Migrate XML parsing performed by Tomcat from the Tomcat-specific XmlMapper
code to the Commons Digester project that is used across a bunch of
Jakarta and non-Jakarta code.  This will allow us to take advantage of
it's ability to handle namespace-sensitive parsing, to be shared (in
/common/lib) if appropriate, as well as the ability
to reuse Digester instances (Tomcat now starts up noticeably faster --
I've got a pretty fast box, but its less than 3 seconds for the default
set of webapps).
The BUILDING.txt instructions have been updated for the new dependencies
on commons-digester, commons-collections, and commons-beanutils.
NOTE:  The configuration rules reflect the refactor that Remy just
committed for DefaultContext.

author: remm
msg: - The class which should be instantiated is StandardDefaultContext (in the Catalina mapper).
- In all other cases, import the new DefaultContext interface.
- I don't think I forgot anything, please check.

author: remm
msg: - Add StandardDefaultContext, implementing DefaultContext.
